On Mon, 2002-11-11 at 14:40, vivek srinivasan wrote:
> Hi All,
> I have a string say, Str. What my program need to test
> is that the string which is returned is an alphabet .
> If the string is an integer it should throw out an
> error.

Is the String going to be the same length always?  Only 1 char?  If so,
why does the method return a String instead of an int?

Anyway, what about getting the char from the String and using
assertTrue() on whether Character.isLetter() or Character.isDigit()?

Scott Stirling
